long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Amaterakami, the "Ad(e)viceTool". 2023.  A tool designed just for you & your daily needs . 

The Ad(e)vice . A sophisticated, compact, small, one click away pocket tool device designed just for you. Explicitly made with the goal of  alleviating your stress and saving your time on your daily basis road of millions of decisions. Where to go, what to drink, who to drink with . . . Make new memories, bring the excitement everywhere you go! .

All problems of the past now, with The Ad(e)vice. You can now just load in your options, and watch the universe take the steering wheel away from your hands, let your indecisions unravel themselves & experience new opportunities .

Including both Dark & Light Mode, The Ad(e)vice comes equipped with 72 affirmations to play your very own Devil's advocate, solve all your indecisions. (C.S.T included, with up to 52 choice slots available to satisfy even the biggest of your hungers, get what you need.) . The extent of its power is limitless, take it anywhere (everywhere) you like.

Updates * coming soon . 
 
Amaterakami Est 2001 , the "Ad(e)viceTool" . 2023.  A tool designed for you , your daily needs . 


To separate, use [ , ] .
